mapper.select:
select sensorId, sensorName, sensorNumber, sensorNode, sensorAddress, sensorCommunicaton, remoteStatus, homeShow, sensor.deviceTypeId, deviceTypeName, sensor.baseId, baseName, sensor.regionId, regionName from sensor left join deviceType on sensor.deviceTypeId = deviceType.deviceTypeId left join base on sensor.baseId = base.baseId left join region on sensor.regionId = region.regionId
and baseName = #{baseName}
and sensorName like concat('%',#{sensorName},'%')
order by sensor.lastModifiedTime desc
select deviceTypeId from deviceType where deviceTypeName = #{deviceTypeName}
select baseId from base where baseName = #{baseName}
select regionId from region where regionName = #{regionName}
